title: Bookjacket Design, "Bookjacket for the Russian Triquarterly, Ardis", 1975
medium: Lithography in red and black ink on white wove paper
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Book cover for the Russian Triquarterly. The title of the book is written across the bottom in red letters and on the spine in white. The author's name is written diagonally in white across the cover and on the bottom of the spine. The cover has a black background with the image of a man or soldier. There are red diagonal lines on the front and back cover in the portion of an X. A white shape runs across the bottom.
